title: Beautiful 866 Sq Foot 1 Bed / 1 Bath with lovely quiet surroundings
posting_body: ['IMT BelaSera at Forest Hills', '2733 Forest Hills Boulevard', 'Coral Springs, FL 33065', 'A wonderful home in Coral Springs is waiting for you!', 'We currently have a gorgeous 1 bedroom 1 bathroom renting for $1690 per month.', 'This unit comes with 866 sq ft.', '**Walk-ins welcome & choose from 3 tour options.', '**', 'Welcome to IMT BelaSera at Forest Hills, our uniquely designed community which expresses the utmost in luxury living.', "Minutes from three golf courses, easy access to local highways, shopping, recreation and more, you're in the heart of one of South Florida's most livable communities.", 'Take a Virtual Tour of Our Property Today!', '<URL>', 'show contact info', 'Community Highlights:', '❖ Courtyard', '❖ Disability Access', '❖ Freeway Access', '❖ Pet Friendly', '❖ Pool', '❖ Public Transportation', '❖ Short Term Lease', '❖ Sports Court', '❖ 24 Hour Emergency Maintenance', '❖ Excellent Location', '❖ Loft Style Apartments', '❖ Online Resident Services', '❖ Professional Management', '❖ Superior Service', '❖ Swimming Pool', '❖ Tennis Court', 'Unit Highlights:', '❖ Air Conditioner', '❖ Dishwasher', '❖ Disposal', '❖ Fireplace', '❖ Garbage Disposal', '❖ Interior Upgrade', '❖ Range', '❖ Renovated', '❖ Renovated 2 BR', '❖ Washer & Dryer', '❖ Fireplace (Upstairs apartments only)', 'Contact:', 'show contact info', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'Leasing Options:', 'Variable', 'Pet Policy:', 'Pets allowed!', 'Pet fee is $300 per pet (maximum of up to 2 pets).', 'Pet rent is $25 per month per pet.', 'No weight restriction.', 'Some breed restrictions apply.', 'Management:', 'IMT Residential', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '96441F4600D54F0']
